sentences.en: All the Army wanted you for was cannon fodder.
sentences.cn: 军队就是要你来当炮灰嘛.

sentences.en: Food and fodder should go ahead of troops and horses.
Good fodder fleshed the steers up.
He was preparing fodder, chopping finely and mixing thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 他在准备饲料, 把它切碎,拌好.

sentences.en: Here you some cannon fodder for the attack mode.
sentences.cn: 下面就为大家介绍一些炮灰的进攻方式.

sentences.en: His highest duty to fodder and water his horses!
sentences.cn: 给马儿们饲草饮水是他的最高职责!

sentences.en: Old movies were the cheapest broadcast fodder.
sentences.cn: 老电影是最廉价的播放素材。

sentences.en: Sometimes usefull in the lategame when your opponet exaggerated with cannon fodder.
sentences.cn: 在后期的游戏中可以拿来对抗敌人的炮灰.

sentences.en: The alfalfa plant is widely used as animal fodder.
sentences.cn: 苜蓿科植物广泛用作动物饲料。

sentences.en: The conscripts were treated as cannon fodder.
sentences.cn: 应征入伍者被当做炮灰。

sentences.en: The goats are penned in and fodder has to be cut and carried each day.
sentences.cn: 山羊被关进圈里，每天都得铡草运料。

sentences.en: The press conference simply provided more fodder for another attack on his character.
sentences.cn: 记者招待会只不过是提供了更多的再次击他人格的口实。

sentences.en: The soldiers were only cannon fodder to their commanders.
sentences.cn: 这些士兵只是指挥官们的牺牲品而已.

sentences.en: This kind of grass is a common fodder for horses.
sentences.cn: 这种草是普通马的饲料.

sentences.en: This story will be more fodder for the gossip columnists.
sentences.cn: 这个传闻会是闲谈专栏作家的又一素材。
